name: Ant no Picnic here
description:
I have no intro screen please read...

UI is only visible in fullscreen... so please play in fullscreen.
Please go back to this page when you're done playing. Thanks :D

Description
  1. Steal food.
  2. Bring home.
  3. Get stronger.
  4. Steal more food.
  5. Dodge hands.
  6. Ruin picnic.
  7. ???
  8. Profit!
Controls

WASD or Arrow-keys to Move
Space to Pickup and Drop food
Carrying food that's too heavy will slow you down.

Credits

All sound-effects are from Freesound.org
Everything else was made by Andreas Clement Holmgaard (Me :P)
